title: Fake Post Claims Congress Fighting Only on 230 Seats in LS Polls
subtitle: A viral message on social media claims that the Congress party, along with SP, BSP, RJD and TMC are not fighting to form majority but to only stop BJP from forming one.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
While the SP is contesting on 37 seats in Uttar Pradesh, the BSP is going for 38 seats in the state.

The RJD is fielding its candidates on 20 seats in Bihar, whereas TMC has 42 candidates contesting in West Bengal, three in Jharkhand, one in the Andamans and six in Assam. It will also field two candidates each in Bihar and Odisha.

The party candidates would also try their luck in 10 Assembly constituencies of Odisha. The state is witnessing simultaneous Lok Sabha and Assembly polls.

Also, a total of 272 seats are required to form a government or coalition government if a single party fails to score majority of the seats.
